#summary Common mistake in cross-referencing
= Using Formatted Reference for cross-refencing =

*Common mistake: Maually type Figure, or Table then using <reference> in cross-referencing* <br>
 The thesis-template has already predefined prefixed, so users do not need to type manually.<br>
  
   http://jkm.myconferences.org/ddecdgbg.png

   http://jkm.myconferences.org/fjcegbgd.png
   
*What is the correct way:*<br>
 Never type any prefix, but you have to use Formatted Reference. LaTeX will use automatically the defined prefixes in LaTeX preamble (Document >Settings>Latex preamble).<br>
   
   http://jkm.myconferences.org/iccbigfh.png
